episodes.original_body:
Case: Rayshawn-Wilson-MVA-4-10-2025
Client: Rayshawn Wilson

__CLIENT CONTACT__
__Details:__ Rayshawn Wilson
DOB 10/21/93
SSN: 400-47-2011

Ph: 502-755-1271

Address: 
4707 Kerrick Lane
Apt 102
Louisville, KY 40258

DOA 4/10/2025

Approaching an intersection when light turned from red to green, sounds like a vehicle coming opposite direction attempted to make turn. 

Intersection 19th and Chestnut

Driver Quintez Massey

Went to St. Mary’s ER

Left wrist, back, neck pain 
__Person Making Contact:__ Justin
__Date & Time__: April 14 2025
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on April 14, 2025, with Justin regarding a motor vehicle accident involving Rayshawn Wilson, case Rayshawn-Wilson-MVA-4-10-2025. The client is Rayshawn Wilson, born October 21, 1993, with Social Security Number 400-47-2011, and he can be reached at 502-755-1271. He resides at 4707 Kerrick Lane, Apt 102, Louisville, KY 40258. Date of accident: April 10, 2025.

On April 10, 2025, while approaching the intersection of 19th and Chestnut, the traffic light changed from red to green, and it appeared that a vehicle coming from the opposite direction attempted to make a turn. The other driver was identified as Quintez Massey. Rayshawn Wilson went to St. Mary’s ER and reported left wrist, back, and neck pain as a result of the incident.

The person making contact was Justin, on April 14, 2025, documenting these details for the case.
episodes.author: Filevine Integration

episodes.natural_language:
The case Rayshawn-Wilson-MVA-4-10-2025 involves the client Rayshawn Wilson. 

A new insurance note dated 4/16/2025 indicates that an attempt was made to set up a claim, but the policy could not be located; as a result, a dummy claim was created to obtain a denial letter. The note identifies the insurance type as Personal Injury Protection (PIP) and lists Progressive Insurance Company as the insurer. The entry was written by Justin Chumbley.

episodes.natural_language:
Case: Rayshawn-Wilson-MVA-4-10-2025. Client: Rayshawn Wilson.

On April 10, 2025, the Rayshawn Wilson motor vehicle accident matter is noted under this case. An email dated July 17, 2025 at 11:05:13 GMT-04:00 was sent from Aaron Whaley of Whaley Law Firm (agwhaley@whaleylawfirm.com) to Justin Chumbley (Justin@whaleylawfirm.com) and Rayshawn Wilson’s Filevine project inbox address RayshawnWilsonMVAZ4978371@louisvilleaccidentlawyer.filevineapp.com. The message directed the recipients to double check and see if Rayshawn has any insurance or household insurance. It further stated: If not, set up KAC then decline and close. The note is signed by Aaron Whaley of Whaley Law Firm, located at 712 Lyndon Ln, Louisville, KY 40222, 502-583-4022.
